name: Shorten a URL using dlvr.it and add it to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Use this template to automatically shorten a new link in a Google Sheets spreadsheet with dlvr.it. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1aorw4WER2xUS9bkTaqOXRPPClx7PWWNL9hmLXREDvHs/edit?usp=sharing).
